Class Post

  • java.lang.Object
    • Post

  • public class Post
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Post(User user, java.lang.String subreddit, PostType type, java.lang.String title)
      Constructs a post with the specified attributes as applicable.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void downvote()
      Decreases the karma of this post and the relevant karma of the user who created the post by one each.
      int getKarma()
      Returns the karma aggregated by the post.
      java.lang.String getSubreddit()
      Returns the subreddit this was posted to.
      java.lang.String getTitle()
      Returns the title of the post.
      PostType getType()
      Returns the type of the post.
      User getUser()
      Returns the user who created this post.
      void upvote()
      Increases the karma of this post and the relevant karma of the user who created the post by two each.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • upvote

        public void upvote()
        Increases the karma of this post and the relevant karma of the user who created the post by two each.

      • downvote

        public void downvote()
        Decreases the karma of this post and the relevant karma of the user who created the post by one each.
